languages.text: "Преподобный говорил, что в каждом отсеке есть борцы за наше дело. Меня обещали посвятить, сделать частью самых верных из нас, и я бы узнал... Но и тогда бы ничего тебе не раскрыл, даже под пытками!"

traits.locale_text: "Преподобный говорил, что в каждом отсеке есть борцы за наше дело. Меня обещали посвятить, сделать частью самых верных из нас, и я бы узнал... Но и тогда бы ничего тебе не раскрыл, даже под пытками!"

languages.text: "The confessor said every compartment has people who fight for our cause. They promised to take me into the circle of our most devoted believers. Then I would know... But even then, I would tell you nothing, not even under torture!"
languages.original_text: "Преподобный говорил, что в каждом отсеке есть борцы за наше дело. Меня обещали посвятить, сделать частью самых верных из нас, и я бы узнал... Но и тогда бы ничего тебе не раскрыл, даже под пытками!"

traits.locale_text: "The reverend said every compartment has people who fight for our cause. They promised to take me into the circle of our most devoted believers, then I would know... But even then, I would tell you nothing, not even under torture!"

"The reverend said every compartment has people who fight for our cause. They promised to take me into the circle of our most devoted believers, then I would know... But even then, I would tell you nothing, not even under torture!"

"The reverend said every compartment has people who fight for our cause. They promised to take me into the circle of our most devoted believers. Then I would know... But even then, I would tell you nothing, not even under torture!"

"The reverend said every compartment has people who fight for our cause. They promised to take me into the circle of our most devoted believers. Then I would know... But even then, I would tell you nothing, not even under torture!"

"The confessor said every compartment has people who fight for our cause. They promised to take me into the circle of our most devoted believers. Then I would know... But even then, I would tell you nothing, not even under torture!"

"The confessor said every compartment has people who fight for our cause. They promised to take me into the circle of our most devoted believers. Then I would know... But even then, I would tell you nothing, not even under torture!"

"The confessor said every compartment has people who fight for our cause. They promised to take me into the circle of our most devoted believers. Then I would know... But even then, I would tell you nothing, not even under torture!"

languages.text: «El confesor dijo que en todos los compartimentos hay gente luchando por nuestra causa. Me prometieron llevarme hasta el círculos de creyentes más devotos. Solo entonces lo sabría... ¡Pero ni a golpe de tortura le diría nada!».
languages.original_text: "The confessor said every compartment has people who fight for our cause. They promised to take me into the circle of our most devoted believers. Then I would know... But even then, I would tell you nothing, not even under torture!"

traits.locale_text: «El confesor dijo que en todos los compartimentos hay gente luchando por nuestra causa. Me prometieron llevarme hasta el círculos de creyentes más devotos. Solo entonces lo sabría... ¡Pero ni a golpe de tortura le diría nada!».

languages.text: 「聴罪師は、どの区画にも我々の大義のために戦う人々がいると言った。彼らは私を最も熱心な信者の輪の中に連れて行くと約束した。そうすれば真実を知れる…しかし、その様な状況になっても、また拷問を受けても、御身には何も語らないだろう」
languages.original_text: "The confessor said every compartment has people who fight for our cause. They promised to take me into the circle of our most devoted believers. Then I would know... But even then, I would tell you nothing, not even under torture!"

traits.locale_text: 「聴罪師は、どの区画にも我々の大義のために戦う人々がいると言った。彼らは私を最も熱心な信者の輪の中に連れて行くと約束した。そうすれば真実を知れる…しかし、その様な状況になっても、また拷問を受けても、御身には何も語らないだろう」

languages.text: “告解神父说，每片甲板上都有人会为了我们的大业而战。那些人答应我，说会将我纳入最虔诚的信徒圈子里，到时候我就知道了……可即便如此，我也不会告诉你任何事情，就算严刑拷打也没用！”
languages.original_text: "The confessor said every compartment has people who fight for our cause. They promised to take me into the circle of our most devoted believers. Then I would know... But even then, I would tell you nothing, not even under torture!"

traits.locale_text: “告解神父说，每片甲板上都有人会为了我们的大业而战。那些人答应我，说会将我纳入最虔诚的信徒圈子里，到时候我就知道了……可即便如此，我也不会告诉你任何事情，就算严刑拷打也没用！”

languages.text: "Der Konfessor sagte, dass in jedem Modul Leute für unsere Sache kämpfen. Sie versprachen mir, mich in den Zirkel unserer hingebungsvollsten Gläubigen aufzunehmen. Dann wüsste ich etwas ... Aber selbst dann würde ich Euch nichts erzählen. Nicht einmal unter Folter!"
languages.original_text: "The confessor said every compartment has people who fight for our cause. They promised to take me into the circle of our most devoted believers. Then I would know... But even then, I would tell you nothing, not even under torture!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Konfessor sagte, dass in jedem Modul Leute für unsere Sache kämpfen. Sie versprachen mir, mich in den Zirkel unserer hingebungsvollsten Gläubigen aufzunehmen. Dann wüsste ich etwas ... Aber selbst dann würde ich Euch nichts erzählen. Nicht einmal unter Folter!"

languages.text: « Selon le confesseur, il y a dans tous les compartiments des gens acquis à notre cause. Ils m'ont promis de m'introduire dans le cercle de nos croyants les plus fervents. Et alors, je saurai… Mais même dans ce cas-là, je ne vous dirai rien ! Pas même sous la torture ! »
languages.original_text: "The confessor said every compartment has people who fight for our cause. They promised to take me into the circle of our most devoted believers. Then I would know... But even then, I would tell you nothing, not even under torture!"

traits.locale_text: « Selon le confesseur, il y a dans tous les compartiments des gens acquis à notre cause. Ils m'ont promis de m'introduire dans le cercle de nos croyants les plus fervents. Et alors, je saurai… Mais même dans ce cas-là, je ne vous dirai rien ! Pas même sous la torture ! »

languages.text: "Günah çıkarıcı her kompartımanda davamız için savaşan insanlar olduğunu söyledi. Beni, kendini en adamış inananların arasına alacağının sözünü vermişti. Öyle olsaydı bilirdim... Ama o durumda bile sana hiçbir şey söylemezdim. İşkence altında bile!"
languages.original_text: "The confessor said every compartment has people who fight for our cause. They promised to take me into the circle of our most devoted believers. Then I would know... But even then, I would tell you nothing, not even under torture!"
